Specials.title: Discover New Flavors
Specials.desc: Indulge in our expertly crafted cocktails, where innovation meets tradition. Each sip is a journey through taste and elegance.
Specials.drink-desc1: A classic blend of gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and Champagne, garnished with a lemon twist.
Specials.drink-desc2: A sophisticated mix of vodka, fresh lemon juice, and homemade lavender syrup, finished with a lavender sprig.
Specials.drink-desc3: Bourbon, smoked rosemary syrup, Angostura bitters, and a hint of orange, served with a smoked rosemary sprig.
Specials.drink-desc4: Tequila, lime juice, Cointreau, and spicy pineapple puree, with a tajín rim and a slice of jalapeño.
Specials.drink-desc5: Gin, elderflower liqueur, fresh cucumber juice, and a splash of soda, garnished with a cucumber ribbon.
Specials.drink-desc6: Vodka, fresh blackberries, basil, lemon juice, and simple syrup, served over crushed ice with a basil leaf.

Contact-us-component.success-alert: Thank you. We will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
Contact-us-component.unsuccess-alert: Oh, something went wrong! Please try again.

Opening-Hours.first-text: 20% off all wine by the glass
